DOC.brief_summary: Investigate safety/tolerability single dose intranasal administration AZD8848 comparator placebo healthy male volunteer seasonal allergic rhinitis male patient season
DOC.brief_title: Tolerability/Safety Intranasal AZD8848 Healthy Male Volunteers Seasonal Allergic Rhinitis Male Patients Out Season
DOC.criteria: History birch and/or timothy grass pollen induce seasonal allergic rhinitis least previous 2 year Body mass index ( BMI ) 19 30 kg/ m2 weight 50 100 kg No clinically relevant abnormal finding Acute illness require medical intervention Definite suspect personal history adverse drug reaction drug hypersensitivity Clinical relevant disease disorder ( past present ) A history asthma
